title: Updated to Android 11. Messages no longer show badge of unread messages
content:
Using NovaLauncher Prime 6.2.12.  Notification badges appear for other apps (GMail, Facebook, Phone) but NOT for Messages.  The badge did work with previous versions of Android on the phone.
Looking through Settings -> Notifications, it looks like everything is enabled/on.

Any ideas?

Any feedback would be appreciated.

TIA.
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3 XL
